properties.markdownProperty:
Here it is an example of a translation file in an archetype repository:
``` archetype.category.general: "General" archetype.category.software_requirements: "Software requirements"
archetype.class.paragraph: "Paragraph" archetype.class.section: "Section" archetype.class.graphic-file: "Graphic file" archetype.class.external-resource: "Ext. resource"
archetype.prop_category.general: "General" archetype.prop_category.details: "Details"
archetype.enum_choices.nd: "Not defined" archetype.enum_choices.developer: "Developer" archetype.enum_choices.user: "User" archetype.enum_choices.customer: "Customer"
archetype.tooltip.is-appendix: "Check if it is an appendix." archetype.tooltip.is-glossary: "Check if it is a glossary item."
archetype.prop_name.name: "Name" archetype.prop_name.version: "Version" archetype.prop_name.role: "Role" archetype.prop_name.date: "Date" ```
